title: Department of Computer Science and Engineering
bannerCon: Advancing computing knowledge through algorithms, systems, and data-driven research in computer science and engineering.

items.subTitle: Overview
items.contents: The goal of CSE department is to make the students reach the mark of excellence in IT arena. Eminent personalities from the industry are invited to address the students which in turn raise the level of confidence among the students. The students are motivated to take part in co-curricular activities and to guide them in organizing guest lectures, seminars, competitions etc.

items.subTitle: Vision
content: To provide Quality technical education in order to transform the students into committed and well-prepared computing professionals with innovative research capabilities, ethical and moral values to build a solid nation.

items.subTitle: Mission
content: Train students in the fundamentals and current technological advancement in the field of Computer Science and Engineering.
Pursue creative and innovative research in Computer Science and Engineering to serve the needs of Industry and Society.
Inculcate integrity, ethical and moral values among the students to become responsible citizens.

content.title: Research Programme
items: Ph.D in Computer Science and Engineering

content.title: M.E. Water Resources and Environmental Engineering – FT
M.E. Water Resources and Environmental Engineering – PT

basic.title: Faculty
basic.description: The Department of Computer Science and Engineering faculty emphasizes computational thinking, software design, and emerging digital technologies. Through project-based learning, research mentoring, and continuous skill development, the faculty prepares students to create efficient, scalable, and innovative computing solutions.

items.title: National Conference / Seminar / Symposium
content: Third National Conference “Technical Innovation and Advancement in Computational Science” (NCTIACS -24) -held on Feb 09, 2024.

The Department of CSE has organized a Second National Conference on ‘Technical Innovation and Advancement in Computational Science – NCTIACS -23’-held on 06th February 2023 Ms. K.Sathya, Regional Sales Manager, Dell Technologies, Coimbatore,Ms. Salonisinghal Project Manager, Intel Digital Asia Pacific & amp are invited.

content: 36 Hours National Level “Hacksprint2.0” on 21.01.2026 @ 08.00 AM to 22.01.2026 @ 08.00 PM.
